title: Designing a Visual Hybrid Development Learning System for Mathematics Education for Children with Autism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic special education knowledge, understanding of general pedagogical methodologies, and foundational mathematics teaching experience
context.additional_context: A course for current or pre-service teachers to develop competencies in designing personalized math education systems reflecting cognitive and learning characteristics of children with autism

learning_goals: Design at least three prototypes of mathematics education content reflecting visual learning characteristics of children with autism
Develop a plan for interactive educational tools based on multimedia cognitive learning theory
Write and present a case study report applying the VHDLS framework through a PBL team project
Five or more strategies for integrating visual elements to enhance attention span in children with autism
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
